The photographs were published by the we: which reported that the figure was spotted above a shopping mall in Zambia.
An alleged eye: witness account was quoted in the article, describing the strange image in the sky and the reactions of the people present at the mall.
Tabloid publications such as the UK: s Sun and Daily Mail aggregated the story, comparing the figure to a Dementor from the Harry Potter franchise, adding to its appeal.
The expert: s analysis revealed that the figure in the photographs was actually a kite, specifically a "Spirit Man" kite designed by Martin Lester, which had been circulating online before it was claimed to have been spotted in Zambia.
